languages.text: "Ну..." {n}Мужчина морщится.{/n} "Законного наследника лишают наследства. Дорогой отец оставил все состояние до копейки не пойми кому — некоему или некоей Фиделио, особе, которая даже не явилась на его похороны. А меня оставил ни с чем. Разве это справедливо?"

"Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"
languages.original_text: "Ну..." {n}Мужчина морщится.{/n} "Законного наследника лишают наследства. Дорогой отец оставил все состояние до копейки не пойми кому — некоему или некоей Фиделио, особе, которая даже не явилась на его похороны. А меня оставил ни с чем. Разве это справедливо?"

traits.locale_text: "Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, someone who didn't even bother coming to his funeral. And I was left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

"Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, someone who didn't even bother coming to his funeral. And I was left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

"Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

"Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

"Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

languages.text: “这么说吧……”{n}他的脸抽搐着。{/n}“合法的继承人被夺走了所有遗产。我亲爱的父亲，非要把他所有财产都留给某个叫菲迪奥的家伙，那个菲迪奥甚至都懒得来参加他的葬礼。至于我，我却一无所有，连一个子儿都没剩下。你觉得这公平吗？”
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧……”{n}他的脸抽搐着。{/n}“合法的继承人被夺走了所有遗产。我亲爱的父亲，非要把他所有财产都留给某个叫菲迪奥的家伙，那个菲迪奥甚至都懒得来参加他的葬礼。至于我，我却一无所有，连一个子儿都没剩下。你觉得这公平吗？”

languages.text: «Bueno...». {n}Hace una mueca.{/n} «Le están robando la herencia al heredero legítimo. Mi querido padre le ha legado toda su fortuna, hasta la última moneda, a una persona desconocida de nombre Fidelio, que ni siquiera se ha dignado a venir a su funeral. Y yo me quedo sin nada. ¿Le parece justo?».
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno...». {n}Hace una mueca.{/n} «Le están robando la herencia al heredero legítimo. Mi querido padre le ha legado toda su fortuna, hasta la última moneda, a una persona desconocida de nombre Fidelio, que ni siquiera se ha dignado a venir a su funeral. Y yo me quedo sin nada. ¿Le parece justo?».

languages.text: 「実はな…」{n}彼は顔をしかめた。{/n}「正統な相続人が遺産を奪われたのさ。親父は自分の全財産を『フィデリオ』とかいう奴に引き継いだらしいんだが、そいつは葬式にすら来なかった。俺には何一つ遺されていない。おかしいと思わないか？」
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

traits.locale_text: 「実はな…」{n}彼は顔をしかめた。{/n}「正統な相続人が遺産を奪われたのさ。親父は自分の全財産を『フィデリオ』とかいう奴に引き継いだらしいんだが、そいつは葬式にすら来なかった。俺には何一つ遺されていない。おかしいと思わないか？」

languages.text: "Nun ..." {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der rechtmäßige Erbe wird seines Vermächtnisses beraubt. Mein lieber Vater hat sein gesamtes Vermögen, bis zur letztem Münze, einem Niemand vermacht – einem gewissen Fidelio, der es nicht einmal für nötig hielt, zur Bestattung zu erscheinen Und ich bekomme nichts. Haltet Ihr das etwa für gerecht?"
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun ..." {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der rechtmäßige Erbe wird seines Vermächtnisses beraubt. Mein lieber Vater hat sein gesamtes Vermögen, bis zur letztem Münze, einem Niemand vermacht – einem gewissen Fidelio, der es nicht einmal für nötig hielt, zur Bestattung zu erscheinen Und ich bekomme nichts. Haltet Ihr das etwa für gerecht?

languages.text: {n}Ol grimace.{/n} « Eh bien... L'héritier légitime va être privé de son héritage. Mon cher père semble avoir légué l'intégralité de sa fortune à un parfait inconnu, un certain Fidélio qui n'a même pas daigné se manifester à ses funérailles. Quant à moi, je n'aurai rien. Vous ne trouvez pas ça injuste ? »
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ol grimace.{/n} « Eh bien... L'héritier légitime va être privé de son héritage. Mon cher père semble avoir légué l'intégralité de sa fortune à un parfait inconnu, un certain Fidélio qui n'a même pas daigné se manifester à ses funérailles. Quant à moi, je n'aurai rien. Vous ne trouvez pas ça injuste ? »

languages.text: "Şey..." {n}Yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Yasal vâris, mirastan mahrum bırakılıyor. Sevgili babam tüm servetini Fidelio denen birine bıraktı, hem de son sikkesine kadar. Fidelio her kimse, cenazeye gelme zahmetine bile girmedi. Ellerim bomboş kaldım ortada. Sizce adalet mi bu?"
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}He grimaces.{/n} "The lawful heir is being robbed of his inheritance. My dear father left his entire fortune, down to the last coin, to some nobody — a certain Fidelio, who hasn't even bothered to come to his funeral. And I'm left with nothing. Do you think it's fair?"

traits.locale_text: "Şey..." {n}Yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Yasal vâris, mirastan menediliyor. Sevgili babam tüm servetini son kuruşuna kadar Fidelio denen birine bıraktı. Bu her kimse, cenazesine gelme zahmetine bile girmedi. Ben de öylece kalakaldım. Sizce adalet bu mu?"
